## R Markdown

Creating variables for data
```{r}
library(readxl)
akcData <- read.csv("akc-data-latest.csv")
westminsterData <- read_excel("Westminster_data_clean.xlsx")
```

Removing Owner column
```{r}
westminsterData = subset(westminsterData, select = -c(Owner))
```

Removing unneeded Columns from AKC Data
```{r}
akcData = subset(akcData, select = -c(description, popularity, grooming_frequency_value, grooming_frequency_category, shedding_value, shedding_category, energy_level_value, trainability_value, trainability_category, demeanor_value))
```
